Location.Description: You are in the starting cave.

$values.Name: Water
$values.Description: Everian, the best!.

$values.Name: Glass
$values.Description: Glassy glass.

RoomTo.Description: You are in a dark cave with a glowing river of lava.

$values.Name: Health++
$values.Description: A potion that will permanently raise health by 20 points

$values.Name: Sword
$values.Description: A sacred blade that was wielded by the paladins

RoomTo.Description: You are in a simple room that has clearly not been entered in hundreds of years

You are in a room with solid brick walls surrounding it.
On the north side of the wall you can see a cracked wall with a ray of light beaming through
You are in a cold room.
You are in a black room, with the only light source being a single torch in the middle.

$values.Name: Keys
$values.Description: A key that can be used to unlock doors

$values.Name: Engulf
$values.Description: A spell book containing Engulf. This spell will engulf the target in a shadow of darkness, causing insanity on even the most mentally resilliant

RoomTo.Description: You are in a beautiful room, with a large fountain residing in the middle, chisseled out of the surroudning rock walls. You can also see carvings along the west wall in the shape of an archway.
A clearly abandoned room with writing scrawled along the sides. There is a desk with a pen and quill

$values.Name: Old note
$values.Description:
Day 86:
I have been trapped here for 86 days now since the cave-in. What am i to do? I dont know if I will be rescued. Why has no one come for me yet. I swear I will have my revenge on that monster. Why has no one come for me?

$values.Name: Straight Sword
$values.Description: A sharpened blade filled with the anger of dead souls

RoomTo.Description: You notice ice encasing the walls of the room. Frozen bodies lie dormant across the ground, however for some reason, you do not feel cold

$values.Name: Frostbite
$values.Description: A jagged dagger with ice radiating off of it. It's cold to the touch

$values.Name: Gold
$values.Description: Gold that can be used to buy and upgrade tools

$values.Name: Fleur
$values.Dialogue: People used to say that there was a beautiful archway that led to a whole 'nother cave system. I wonder where it went

$values.Name: Health Potion
$values.Description: A elegant looking bottle with a purple liquid inside

$values.Name: Helm
$values.Description: A simple metal helmet

RoomTo.Description: You can feel the souls of the fallen floating around the room

$values.Name: Cheese
$values.Description: Stinky old cheese that has clearly been here for years

$values.Name: Bread
$values.Description: A small slice of bread

$values.Name: Wooden Sword
$values.Description: A splintered old sword

$values.Name: Hells Dagger
$values.Description: A dagger forged in the upper levels of hell. Not especially strong, but highly effective against holy creatures

$values.Name: Hellspawn Set
$values.Description: A flimsy leather waist strap with gloves and boots

$values.Name: FlameSpear
$values.Description: A spell book containing FlameSpear. Throw a spear of fire towards tour enemy

$values.Name: Apple
$values.Description: a beautiful rosy red apple, it looks delicious.

$values.Name: Stone Apple
$values.Description: A beautiful apple made of stone.

$values.Name: Fists
$values.Description: Your fists. Saggy flesh and bone

$values.Name: Stale Bread
$values.Description: Old stale bread. It doesnt look edible

$values.Name: testSummon
$values.Description: A simple test summon

$values.Name: Skin
$values.Description: You plain flesh and bones
